text:
President Trump's campaign plans to resume holding rallies in the next two weeks, with advisers banking on the massive protests in recent weeks dampening criticism over holding large in-person events amid COVID-19 pandemic, multiple sources told @ABC News.
https://t.co/jEn8Okc2GV
